name: gatekeep
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to try to control who gets particular resources, power, or opportunities, and who does not: The system gatekeeps quite well. A key task of the facilitator is to gatekeep group interaction so that more confident members are helped to learn how not to dominate quieter members. Related words
gatekeeper
gatekeeping
More examplesFewer examplesThe country's healthcare system operates on a referral basis, which gatekeeps access to care. Their work has been highly gatekept.This can have serious consequences on their ability to gatekeep effectively.
